participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: Amina is resilient and resourceful, having overcome significant challenges in her life. She values freedom and independence.
participant_1.background: i was forced to marry when i was a teenager. my aunt helped me escape when i was in my early twenties. i was born in somalia. now i live in the united states.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Jessica is active and health-conscious, with a passion for sports and a love for nature. She is enthusiastic and caring.
participant_2.background: i enjoy sports such as running. i'm a vegetarian. my favorite color is blue. i am married. i am a woman.
